name: Patimas Computers Berhad
overview:
Patimas Computers Berhad provides information and communications technologies (ICT) services, solutions, and products in Malaysia and internationally. Its ICT infrastructure technology services include e-business infrastructure and solutions, enterprise application interface services, business continuity and disaster recovery, enterprise and network services, and data center design and construction services; and ICT software development and services comprise outsourcing of software development, stock-broking applications, financial management applications, office productivity applications, e-business applications, and education and training for ICT, as well as IBM, Sybase, and Oracles implementation services. The company also provides ICT technical support services; and system integration and outsourcing services, such as managed network and security, broadband connectivity, hosting and co-location, disaster recovery, data center outsourcing, business process outsourcing, and ICT outsourcing services. In addition, it develops and sells computer related products; provides computer related products and services for finance, stock-broking, and manufacturing industries; distributes computer hardware, software, and other related products; and provides software solutions.

The company is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
